title: looking for mentor to help me climb
body:
hey there 

im starting to spend a lot of time in league and im wanting to climb but dont know how. ive been watching videos and plays from people, youtube videos, streams etc but mainly wanting someone who could play with me to help mentor and guide me run through things im doing wrong. im currently bronze 5 and its elo hell cant seem to climb.

ive moved from adc to jng top to try help climb but still not having any luck someone please help im usually playing at night but if someone could pm me or add me in game and send a message that would be amazing 

in game: bladedyosh11/luxbux
discord: yoshii#1265

replies.body: Add me, Ill go through a game with u
